div.p: CDC Public Health Information Network local coding system used for creating the concepts that are not available in the Standard Development Organization(SDO) Vocabulary like SNOMED CT, LOINC, ICD-9, etc.

publisher.value: Public Health Information Network Vocabulary Access and Distribution System (PHIN VADS)

description.value: CDC Public Health Information Network local coding system used for creating the concepts that are not available in the Standard Development Organization(SDO) Vocabulary like SNOMED CT, LOINC, ICD-9, etc.

display.value: eICR was processed - with a warning
eICR was processed - with a severe warning
